Data Transfer Objects module#

Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for the application.

These classes serve as lightweight, structured containers for transferring data between different layers of the system (e.g., services, routes).

class ConfigurationUpdate(latitude: float, longitude: float, timezone_str: str, weather_threshold: float, max_bookings_per_event: int = 10, default_opening_time: time = datetime.time(17, 0), default_closing_time: time = datetime.time(22, 0))[source]#

Bases: object

DTO for updating system configuration.

latitude#

Geographic latitude (-90 to 90) for weather data.

Type:

float

longitude#

Geographic longitude (-180 to 180) for weather data.

Type:

float

timezone_str#

IANA timezone identifier (e.g., ‘UTC’, ‘America/New_York’).

Type:

str

weather_threshold#

Minimum acceptable weather condition rating (0-100%).

Type:

float

max_bookings_per_event#

Default maximum number of user bookings per event.

Type:

int

default_opening_time#

Default event start time (local time).

Type:

datetime_time

default_closing_time#

Default event end time (local time).

Type:

datetime_time

class EventData(event_title: str, event_description: str, event_date: datetime, opening_time: time, closing_time: time, max_bookings: int)[source]#

Bases: object

DTO for creating or updating an event slot.

event_title#

Title of the event (up to 30 characters recommended).

Type:

str

event_description#

Event description (up to 255 characters).

Type:

str

event_date#

Date of the event (typically in UTC).

Type:

datetime

opening_time#

Event start time (local time).

Type:

datetime_time

closing_time#

Event end time (local time).

Type:

datetime_time

max_bookings#

Maximum allowed user bookings for the event.

Type:

int

class WeatherInfo(condition_rating: int | None = None, weather_warning: bool = False, weather_forecast: bool = False)[source]#

Bases: object

DTO for summarizing weather evaluation results.

condition_rating#

Weather condition rating (0–100%).

Type:

Optional[int]

weather_warning#

True if warning triggered.

Type:

bool

weather_forecast#

True if forecast data is present.

Type:

bool

class WeatherData(times: ~typing.List[str] = <factory>, dew_points: ~typing.List[float] = <factory>, precip_probs: ~typing.List[float] = <factory>, cloud_covers: ~typing.List[float] = <factory>, visibilities: ~typing.List[float] = <factory>, tz_str: str = 'UTC')[source]#

Bases: object

DTO for storing detailed hourly weather forecast data.

times#

ISO 8601 formatted timestamps for hourly data points.

Type:

List[str]

dew_points#

Hourly dew point temperatures (°C).

Type:

List[float]

precip_probs#

Hourly precipitation probabilities (percentage).

Type:

List[float]

cloud_covers#

Hourly cloud cover percentages.

Type:

List[float]

visibilities#

Hourly visibility distances (in meters).

Type:

List[float]

tz_str#

Timezone string used to interpret timestamps (e.g., ‘UTC’).

Type:

str

class EventTimes(start_local: datetime, end_local: datetime, start_utc: datetime, end_utc: datetime)[source]#

Bases: object

DTO for event timings in both local timezone and UTC.

start_local#

Event start time in local timezone.

Type:

datetime

end_local#

Event end time in local timezone.

Type:

datetime

start_utc#

Event start time in UTC.

Type:

datetime

end_utc#

Event end time in UTC.

Type:

datetime
